titles.title: To prohibit an increase in the number of flag and general officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 1/14/2014--Introduced. Prohibits the use of any funds appropriated for FY2014 for flag or general officers for each military department that are in excess to the number of such officers serving in such military department as of the date of enactment of this Act.
